alert.note: Alert for Chattooga; Floyd; Gordon; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Floyd, southwestern Whitfield, southeastern Walker, northwestern Gordon and northeastern Chattooga Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Lake Marvin, or 10 miles northwest of Calhoun, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Naomi, Mill Creek, Subligna, Suttles Mill, Villanow, Sugar Valley, Everett Springs and Lake Marvin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
